frontmatter.title: Multi-language support, including RTL
frontmatter.meta_title: FluxStore - Universal mobile commerce Flutter app for Magento, WooCommerce and Opencart
frontmatter.meta_description: Fluxstore is universal app that fully integration with the Woocommerce, Mangeto and Opencart

markdownRemark.html: Version 1.2 comes with the powerful multi-language feature. It supports to change not only the UI but also the Products and Category content via WMPL plugins (for WooCommerce version).
